website_summaries.verdict: This comprehensive book covers several language arts topics in a kid-friendly way. Expect to help with some instructions, though.
pros: A 3-in-1 book that targets reading skills, vocabulary, and spelling exercises
Includes traditional fill-in-the-blank activities and fun challenges
Colorful, engaging, and easy to understand
cons: Some instructions are written in language too complex for young children
Would be easier to use if pages were perforated

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old grandson has high functioning autism. Where he struggles most is with reading. Up until now he’s been taking special education classes at the local public school, but with the virus, he will be homeschooled from now on. I wasn’t sure where to start and this book has been great. It’s helped a lot with his reading, helping him to understand and hear the sounds. I’m not sure he will ever read well, but these workbooks will be an asset in helping to read at least some. My goal is to get him reading at least on a second grade level. These books will aid greatly reaching that goal.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great book. I got them all for end-of-year gifts ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book. I got them all for end-of-year gifts to the kids I tutor in reading, best I've seen. In fact, had to send back a couple others and re-order these for everyone because they are so complete, so engaging and colorful. Lots of games to make it fun. The only thing I'm not sure about is that the directions for the exercises are really written in big words. If a kid can't figure out the exercise on their own, they need adult help to explain the point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using to avoid summer brain drain
customer_reviews.text: I am utilizing this book as a summer brain drain avoidance method. My son needs to do a certain number of pages for iPad time. It is a great book that starts out with easier items and has slowly gotten to more complex items, which I think is preparing my son for 1st grade. I will definitely get the 2nd grade one next summer.
customer_reviews.author: MaineMomOfOne

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1st grade
customer_reviews.text: I opted for this for my 1st graders language arts. It touches on a lot of different material from word sounds to compound words to reading comprehension stuff. I will buy a better ela program next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sshehadeh

customer_reviews.title: Pages not perforated
customer_reviews.text: Overall workbook is fun for our daughter, although the activities are kind of repetitive in their sections and the pages are not perforated so ripping them out as worksheets is pretty difficult.
customer_reviews.author: flowingly

customer_reviews.title: It has been great. Well paced
customer_reviews.text: My son does a few pages a day to build his spelling skills. It has been great. Well paced, not too challenging. Interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Allred

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old LOVES this book! She gets ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES this book! She gets excited to do a few pages every day during the summer. It helps me make sure that she is staying on track with where she needs to be for her age AND to it helps her remember everything over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: After review some of the pages I can say. I’m honestly very happy I got this for my granddaughter. Can’t wait to start using it
customer_reviews.author: S P Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeschooling!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book and so does my five-year-old son. Because of COVID, we had to start homeschooling and I wanted to be sure I had a good book that had enough lessons for the whole school year, and this fit the bill! we got the flashcards that are made by this company as well and they work perfectly together.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my first graders, we have been able to pratice for review and to get ahead for the read. I plan to continue to order as he progresses through each grade level
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J. Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great Resource for 1st grader
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to use through COVID summer. I wanted to make sure my 1st grader, almost 2nd grader maintained the skills and easy reading, writing, and phonics. This was well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Content is more for Kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. Too easy for my 6yo emerging 1st grader
customer_reviews.author: Z1Z2

customer_reviews.title: It's been helping
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this to help our 6 year old in first grade. His teachers said they have seen a huge improvement.
customer_reviews.author: jose garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Im a high school teacher and I approve. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BingBong

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice
customer_reviews.text: This book is great extra practice at home. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old that struggles with reading
customer_reviews.text: For my 7 year old that struggles with reading, this is an amazing resource! I don't mind to set and do reading exercises with him, the problem is that I'm not gifted in teaching. When we use this, I don't have to be :) He really loves the work compared to other things that we have tried and it has helped him to not lose knowledge over summer vacation and even dance academically.....all in just a few minutes a day! We might spend 15 minutes doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kwill09

customer_reviews.title: Great resource.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and great! My first grader can do this pretty independently. Exactly mimics what they are learning in school.
customer_reviews.author: saft1234

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these books. They cover a huge range of material and progress from extremely basic (what would be about the beginning of kindergarten) to advanced (what would be around the beginning of 2nd grade).
customer_reviews.author: M. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves all the activities in this book. Perfect for kids during this quarantine
customer_reviews.author: Milo B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping busy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because he was going to have a long christmas break from school almost three weeks. When he got his book He immidieatly opened it and started working on it. It was very understandable to him and when he returned to school he returned sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these books. They cover a huge range of material and progress from basic to advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Smcm

customer_reviews.title: Lovely book
customer_reviews.text: I got this book for my 5 year old boy . This is good for starting . Concept of this book is good if you will follow step by step .
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Father and son pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with First Grade Super Math Success (Sylvan Super Workbooks) (Math Super Workbooks) to supplement my son's homework. I am happy with the content and my son seems to enjoy the worksheets.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherking

customer_reviews.title: Great workbook for homeschoolers...
customer_reviews.text: I use this book to homeschool my 5 year old and it is well put together and organized for planning. Thanks SYLVAN...
customer_reviews.author: dangerous lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! It’s big, fun and colorful! Also it holds my grandsons attention and it makes learning for him fun!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: It had a weird brown circle stain on the cover and some of the pages were filled out already. I am a bit disappointed at the quality of this. Other than that the content is good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! Seemed right in line with what my kiddo was/is learning.
customer_reviews.author: WriteAboutIt

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: Helpful book it is thorough on first grade language art curriculum. It is a thick book with many different activities I particularly like the reading comprehension part of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for age
customer_reviews.text: Very good book. lots of exercises.appropriate for an advanced kindergarterner. Mostly practice on reading and writing of words. very few readings.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: homeschool helps
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this book for my 5 yr old. She has moved past the kindergarten books and this is a perfect transition, and she is doing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Renia Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to understand, fun for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: A excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: We use this book for homeschooling our 6 year old. We finished the kindergarten book first and moved on to 1st grade. The books are actually quite large, which is a plus and very understandable. We have looked into purchasing other LA books but the Sylvan books are colorful which is an attention grabber, full of information and great value. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WonderfuL!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great book for ESL students. I am using it with 4 and 5 year olds and they are learning so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these books! I have to ask them to take a break... Hehehe
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Used to supplement 1st grade homeschooling curriculum and has worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Used to supplement 1st grade homeschooling curriculum and has worked really well. It is colorful and helps keep my grandson engaged with the lessons. This is all three books in one and is cheaper than buying them all separately.
customer_reviews.author: jfraz

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I homeschool and I bought this workbook to supplement with language arts. I wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: FIRTS GRADE LANGUAGE ARTS SUCCESS {SYLVAN SUPER WORKBOOK}
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is five years old she is in 1st grade ,she loved it and is so happy with this book.She has told me that now she understand more better at school after she has practiced this book and also she said that her friends at school are asking her how she knows the answers and her teacher has noticed that she's improved Now she has in her report card two A"s and my daughter says that she wants to get only A"s in her report card, I as a mother I feel so happy to see what are my daughter's goal.
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good review book
customer_reviews.text: Its a good book with a lot of good kindergarten review plus new 1st grade info. But too big/thick. Too hard to open and write. Should have gotten the smaller books.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Too many writings
customer_reviews.text: While it is good to sell used book, it is not worthwhile putting this type of book for sale. Just throw it away. What kind of money do you want?.
customer_reviews.author: isaac ajayi

customer_reviews.title: Captures attention
customer_reviews.text: The book is easy to understand and covers a wide range. The person I purchased it for seems to enjoy the book, as so far there has not been any "excuses" to complete a few pages.
customer_reviews.author: TR

product_meta.title: 1st Grade Jumbo Language Arts Success Workbook: 3 Books In 1 # Reading Skill Builders, Spellings Games, Vocabulary Puzzles; Activities, Exercises, and ... Ahead (Sylvan Language Arts Jumbo Workbooks)
